attributes.action: Scrap the Health in Pregnancy grant in favour of 'Green Vouchers'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government's proposal to offer grants in the form of cash payments to pregnant mothers is not the answer to improving the health of the pregnant mother or unborn child. We propose the introduction of 'Green Vouchers' which may only be spent on pre-approved healthy foods.
